description_html:
Superlight is a task light reduced to its essence. A gestural line in space resulting in a precise yet playful structure defying gravity with an appearance of near weightlessness. Designed under the axiom “form follows phenomena” the design introduces a new level of precision and control in providing flexible positioning and glare-free light within to- day’s open plan, screen-dominated workspaces. Its unique aesthetics achieves fluid, sweeping movement in every direction with a full 3-axis range of motion providing warm glare-free LED light exactly where you need it. Available as a desk, floor, wall, clamp or
grommet mounted fixture.
Designers: Peter Stathis & Matthew Boyko, 2017.
